TopicTitle: Coordinates for Polar Lowlands on Mun

Articles.Content:
I've found every other biome there and planted a flag, but can't seem to find a Power Lowlands spot. I've looked at Mun biome maps and even tried hopping my lander around, but still can't find a spot?

Co-ordinates, anyone?
Oh wow, I didn't know that existed. Thanks!
If only it were available as an overlay on your map view for choosing your landing site.
